title: Guided energy healing meditation with Myra Lewin — Hale Pule Ayurveda & Yoga
description: A guided energy healing meditation for healthy relationships.
cleaned_text: Intuitive Energy Guided Meditation: Relationship with Yourself and Others Intuitive Energy Guided Meditation: Relationship with Yourself and Others $2.88 This guided meditation, using Hale Pule's Intuitive Energy Practice, is designed to teach you how to cultivate a healthy relationship with yourself and those around you. *This meditation is provided as an mp3 download link available for 24 hours upon purchase. It is best to download onto your computer, and then transfer onto a mobile device via iTunes, Google Drive or DropBox. Please note that these meditations were recorded with a live audience and do contain some background noise. For more intuitive energy practices with Hale Pule, check out our podcast [Spark your Intuition](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/spark-your-intuition/id1478489515?ign-mpt=uo%3D4). [Contact us](mailto:info@halepule.com?subject=IEP%20Download) with any questions.
